title: Tamari and Balsamic Roasted Asparagus
directions: Arrange asparagus in single layer on a baking sheet; drizzle with olive oil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake for 12 minutes or until tender.

Melt butter in a small skillet over medium heat, and cook 3 minutes or until lightly browned, shaking pan occasionally. Remove from heat, and stir in tamari and balsamic vinegar. Drizzle over asparagus, tossing well to coat.
